description:
webkit_support: Introduce indirect definitions for base::VKEY_* in
order to remove keyboard_codes.h dependency from DumpRenderTree.

BUG=none
TEST=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=57823

messages.text: This seems like a good approach to me. LG, although maybe we should migrate test_shell code to use this?

Thanks for reviewing.

> This seems like a good approach to me. LG, although maybe we should migrate
> test_shell code to use this?

I don't think so.  We have no reason to avoid "base" dependency in test_shell.

subject: webkit_support: Introduce indirect definitions for base::VKEY_* in...
